description: The story takes place in the near future in a city called Heartland. http://anidb.net/ch28990 [Tsukumo Yuuma] is a young duelist who strives to become the Duel Monsters champion, despite being an amateur. One day, during a duel with a school bully, a mysterious spirit called http://anidb.net/ch28991 [Astral] appears before Yuuma, and helps him to win. Astral then explains to Yuuma that he is searching for his lost memories, which have been transformed into 99 "Xyz Monster" cards called "Numbers" and have been scattered across the globe. The "Numbers" have the ability to possess the duelists who own them and bring out their darkest desires. In order to recover his memories, and collect the "Numbers" cards, Astral teams up with Yuuma.

REGULAR.description:
It’s sink or swim for Yuma when he puts his deck on the line and challenges Shark, the school bully, to a duel.  Can Yuma beat the school’s #1 duelist, or will Yuma’s life points get reeled in by this ruthless opponent?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bring it to `Em!!
Katto Bingu Da ze, Ore!!
Yuma startet durch - Teil 1
かっとビングだぜ, オレ!!

REGULAR.description:
It’s a dueling disaster for Yuma when a mysterious visitor from another galaxy suddenly appears, putting his duel with Shark in serious jeopardy!

titles.title: My Name is Astral

Yuma startet durch - Teil 2

REGULAR.description:
When the city is thrust into chaos after several of its computers become infected by a malicious virus, Yuma and Tori set out to find the culprit!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Computervirus - Teil 1

REGULAR.description:

The legendary Dark Magician and Blue-Eyes White Dragon come out of retirement when a wise old man named Master Roku challenges Yuma to duel!  Can Yuma’s Dark Magician pull a victory out of thin air, or will the power of Master Roku’s three Blue-Eyes be too much for Yuma to handle?

When a mysterious fortune teller agrees to help out Yuma’s friends, they soon find themselves in a terrifying situation that no one ever saw coming!  Can Yuma rescue his pals, or will the all-knowing Fortuno see to it that Yuma doesn’t succeed?

Yuma and his friends get all decked out for the event of the year - the World Duel Carnival Finals party!  But when Yuma forgets his invite, can he find a way into the festivities, or will he be forced to hit the road and head home early?!

To assess Yuma’s dueling skills, Vetrix hires the Triad of Terror, a trio of cunning card sharks, to triple team him!  Yuma better figure out a way to roll through this threesome before his dueling goes off the rails!

The World Duel Carnival takes a dark turn as the finalists descend into the Dragon’s Den – a dark and dangerous duel track that will bring defeat for many a duelist!  Can Yuma make his way through the treacherous track, or will the Dragon’s Den deliver a knockout blow?!

It’s the cataclysmic conclusion between Shark and Quattro!  If Shark doesn’t make a comeback from the depths of defeat, not only is he out of the tournament, but his quest for justice will go unserved!

titles.title: Rage und Rache
Shark Kakusei! Aratanaru Chaos Numbers Arawaru
Shark Reawakens! A New Chaos Number Appears

There’s chaos in the canyon when Yuma duels Nistro to see who will get the last spot in the World Duel Carnival semifinals!  Can Yuma dodge defeat in the desert, or is Nistro destined to rock Yuma`s world?

titles.title: A Fierce Fight! Yuma VS Gauche: This is my Dueling Soul

REGULAR.description:
When Yuma’s deck goes missing, he and the gang set out to look for it!   But when their search leads them to Heartland City, they end up finding much more than they bargained for!

titles.title: Duell-Deck-Diebstahl
Kessen e no Joshou: Aratanaru Teki Dr. Faker

REGULAR.description:
Yuma sets his sights on reeling in Shark in the first battle of the semifinals, but when his foe starts off dueling like a guppy, Yuma questions if he’s being baited!  Does Yuma learn this far too late to escape a sinister Shark attack?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der blinde Haifisch
Kiekaketa Kizuna! Yuuma VS Shark, Shukumei no Duel!!
The Disappearing Bonds! Yuma VS Shark, the Fated Duel!!
消えかけた絆! 遊馬VSシャーク, 宿命の決闘[デュエル]!!

REGULAR.description:
This is it!  Yuma’s jaw-dropping duel against Shark in the World Duel Carnival semifinals draws to a finish!  Can Yuma rise above his razor-sharp rival, or will he be dragged down to the depths of defeat?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Rettung des Retters
Shark`s Back! The Bonds Connected by "Kattobing!"
Yomigaere Shark! Kizuna ni Kaketa "Kattobing!"
蘇れシャーク! 絆に懸けた「かっとビング!」

REGULAR.description:
The mighty masked duelist Vetrix faces off against the Number Hunter Kite!  Unfortunately for Kite, Vetrix springs a shocking surprise that makes dueling all but impossible!  Can Kite rise above Vetrix’s heinous handicap, or has this undefeated duelist finally met his match?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Osorubeki Yami no Sakuryaku! Abakareta Tron no Shoutai!?
The Scheme of a Horrifying Darkness! Tron`s True Form Is Revealed!?
Vertrix fiese Tricks
恐るべき闇の策略!暴かれたトロンの正体!?

REGULAR.description:
The explosive end to the battle between Kite and Vetrix roars to a finish!  As the battle climaxes, Yuma sets out to free Kite’s brother Hart from Vetrix’s grasp, while Kite duels knowing full well that Hart’s safety hangs in the balance! Can either of them rise above the risks, or are they both fated to fail?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein hoher Preis
Neo Galaxy Eyes Houkou! Yami o Kuzaku Kyoudai no Kizuna!
Roar, Neo Galaxy Eyes! The Brothers` Bond that Shatters the Darkness
ネオ・ギャラクシーアイズ咆哮!闇を打ち砕く兄弟の絆!

REGULAR.description:
It all comes down to this!  Yuma squares off against Vetrix in a battle that will determine the first ever World Duel Carnival Champion!  Can Yuma figure out a way to outduel Vetrix, or will Vetrix and his devastating deck destroy Yuma’s chance of being a champion?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An All-Out War Between Numbers! Yuma vs Tron! The Surprising Duel in a Super-Strange Space
Finale! - Teil 1
Numbers Souryokusen! Yuuma vs Tron Kyoui Chooikuukan Duel!
ナンバーズ総力戦!遊馬VSトロン驚異の超異空間デュエル!

REGULAR.description:
As the duel between Vetrix and Yuma races to its cataclysmic conclusion, Yuma stares down defeat and comes face-to-face with Vetrix’s shocking secret!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Finale, Finale! - Teil 2
Senritsu no Duel! Tachiagare Kizuna no Eye Zexal
The Terrifying Duel! Arise, Hero of Bonds, ZEXAL!
戦慄のデュエル!立ち上がれ絆の英雄ゼアル

REGULAR.description:
This is it! The earth-shattering ending of Yuma’s duel against Vetrix!  Can Yuma rise above Vetrix’s unrelenting onslaught, or will he meet defeat and lose everything he holds dear – his soul, his Numbers and… Astral?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Believe in Victory! The Final Shining Draw!
Finale, Finale! - Teil 3
Shouri o Shinjite! Final Shining Draw!
勝利を信じて!ファイナル・シャイニング・ドロー!

REGULAR.description:
Yuma learns the details of Dr. Faker’s diabolical plan to destroy Astral World!  Can Yuma figure out a way to stop Faker, or is the future of Astral World a thing of the past?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Countdown beginnt
Houkai e no Jokyoku: Sphere Field Hou no Kyoui!
Prelude to Ruin: The Threat of the Sphere Field Cannon!
崩壊への序曲 スフィア・フィールド砲の脅威!

REGULAR.description:
Kite, Shark and Yuma join forces to take down Dr. Faker!  Can this trio work together as a team and put an end to Faker’s fury, or will Faker and his deck prove to be too much of a challenge for these three fearless friends?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Drei gegen Faker - Teil 1
The Three Heroes Unite, One Last Duel For The Future!
Tsudoishi San Yuushi, Mirai o Kaketa Last Duel!
集いし三勇士, 未来を賭けたラストデュエル!

REGULAR.description:
With the fate of Astral World hanging in the balance, Yuma, Kite and Shark set their sights on stopping Dr. Faker, but before our three heroes can make their final move, Dr. Faker reveals the shocking reason behind his diabolical plan!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Drei gegen Faker - Teil 2
Senritsu no Saikyouryuu Arawaru! Gigaishinryuu Heartearth Dragon
The Most Evil, Horrifying Dragon Appears! The False Skeletal God Dragon, Heart-eartH Dragon
戦慄の最凶龍現る!偽骸神龍ハートアース・ドラゴン

REGULAR.description:
When a mysterious being from Barian World appears, Yuma, Kite and Shark must work together and battle like never before if they want to save Hart, Astral World… and themselves!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Drei gegen Faker - Teil 3
Kiseki no Kattobing! Mirai o Kirihirake Zexal!!
The Miraculous Kattobing! ZEXAL, Open The Path to the Future!!
奇跡のかっとビング! 未来を切り開けゼアル!!

REGULAR.description:
The stage is set for the ultimate battle between Yuma and Kite, but just when Yuma’s about to high five the sky, Kite brings him crashing down to earth with a startling revelation!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kites Zweifel - Teil 1
Subete o Kakete! Yuuma VS Kaito!!
The Time For The Showdown!! Yuma VS Kaito, The Other Finals of the World Duel Carnival
全てを賭けて! 遊馬vsカイト!!

REGULAR.description:
The back and forth battle between Kite and Yuma comes to an exciting conclusion that leaves one of our duelists down for the count! Will Yuma’s dream of pulling out a victory become a reality, or is Kite going to turn this dream into a nightmare?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kites Zweifel - Teil 2
Maboroshi no Daigekitou!! Double Hope vs Double Galaxy-Eyes!!
The Illusive Great Clash!! Double Hope vs. Double Galaxy-Eyes!!
幻の大激突!!ダブル希望皇VSダブル銀河眼!!
